safetyTips: All stock is disinfected prior to packing, contact-free delivery. Feel free to contact us for further information.
name: Powder Cosmetics
description: Powder is your neighbourhood beauty store: offering the best in skincare, haircare, makeup and baby products. A haven for beauty lovers, you will find honest & expert advice on some of the best products right on your doorstep. We can offer remote tips to ensure our customers experience the ultimate results-oriented self-care treatments in the comfort of your home.  Our online stock is updated daily but, please do call if your favourite products is not listed yet and we'll do our best to assist. Call us, or order online (online delivery charges refunded for all local orders)
